name: userstyles.org: Stylish v2
additional_info:
(12/04/2012) Changed rating icons' colors; Changed color of links again :(
(01/04/2012) Changed color of links.
(31/03/2012) Reduced transparency of text containers; Re-added rating icons.
(23/08/2011) Updated for the new site layout.
(15/04/2011) Fixed rating icon alignment in two-line links.
(13/04/2011) Two-column style lists now working in Chrome 11.
(12/04/2011) Fixed 1px white line appearing on certain window sizes; Went back to default unvisited link color; Got it working on Chrome 11.
(11/04/2011) Round corners for rating tooltips, improved rating bullets, some bugfixin'.
(09/04/2011) Removed underline from links; Changed color of obsolete styles; Fixed an undesired bullet point in login forms (thanks to user 14255).
(07/04/2011) Added a subtle shadow to those white boxes.
